text: @realDonaldTrump Really?   Every authority, resource and tool?  By closing the White House pandemic office?  By restricting testing for coronavirus?  By lying incessantly about the availability of testing?  By calling the virus a "foreign virus?"  What are you going to do, build a "wall?"
